name: Agility
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

name: Alarum
oracle_text: Untap target nonattacking creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"One timely cry of warning can save nine of surprise."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Armorer Guildmage
oracle_text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Zhalfir's destiny rings in tempered steel.
—Armorer Guild maxim

name: Armor of Thorns
oracle_text:
You may cast Armor of Thorns as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant nonblack creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Azimaet Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Azimaet Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"A vizier's dish, best served drenched in honey and almonds."
—Suq'Ata royal recipe

name: Bay Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
"Wear the falcon's feathers in your hair—
be fast as the falcon, bright as the Sun."
—"Rise on Wings," Zhalfirin song

name: Benevolent Unicorn
oracle_text: If a spell would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that permanent or player instead.
flavor_text:
The best use for a unicorn's horn is to adorn a unicorn.
—Femeref adage

name: Binding Agony
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, Binding Agony deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
A crash of rhinos in my head
—Femeref expression meaning "a severe head pain"

name: Blistering Barrier
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text:
I live without food, stand without leg, wound without force, and am harder to fight than to kill. What am I?
—Femeref riddle

name: Bone Harvest
oracle_text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Only fools believe they will face my armies but once."
—Kaervek

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

name: Breathstealer
oracle_text: {B}: Breathstealer gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"As a child, I slept with a cloth over my face, to hide from the spirits that might pull the air from my lungs."
—Mosi, Femeref weaver

name: Builder's Bane
oracle_text: Destroy X target artifacts. Builder's Bane deals damage to each player equal to the number of artifacts they controlled that were put into a graveyard this way.
flavor_text: There is only so much a person may be buried with.

name: Burning Shield Askari
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{R}{R}: Burning Shield Askari gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Any day that I ride my horse up to my ankles in the remains of my enemies is a good day."
—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Cadaverous Knight
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
flavor_text:
Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.
—Shadow Guild saying

name: Chaos Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Wall.
• Chaos Charm deals 1 damage to target creature.
• Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Choking Sands
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Swamp land. If that land was nonbasic, Choking Sands deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
flavor_text:
"The people wiped the sand from their eyes and cursed—and left the barren land to the hyenas and vipers."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Civic Guildmage
oracle_text:
{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
To condemn the innocent you must first condemn yourself.
—Civic Guild maxim

name: Cloak of Invisibility
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has phasing and can't be blocked except by Walls. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of their untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"Useful . . . if you can find it."
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Crash of Rhinos
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way.
—Femeref adage

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Femeref was guided by the wisdom of the Council of Voices. But in one terrible instant, they were slain, leaving Asmira as the sole voice of leadership."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"The ceremony ended with a voice from the shadows, a voice with vast, ominous power."
—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Dazzling Beauty
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step.
Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Dirtwater Wraith
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{B}: Dirtwater Wraith gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The foul entities of the Uuserk swamp had never before dared to spread their influence to the very heart of Zhalfir."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Disempower
oracle_text: Put target artifact or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Mangara is gone. Who among you doubts that I have taken his power?"
—Kaervek

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"There are harsher ways to learn the meaning of the word 'no.'"
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its mana value.
flavor_text:
"Suq'Ata believe in trade; Femeref, alms; Zhalfirins, steel. Be warned, Kaervek—now we are joined."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Drain Life
oracle_text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

name: Dream Cache
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text:
Dreams' riches are easily spent.
—Suq'Ata adage

name: Dream Fighter
oracle_text: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor_text: Not only the sleeping should fear dreams.

name: Dwarven Nomad
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
A dwarf's life belongs as much to the land as to the dwarf.
—Creed of the Stonethrow Clan

name: Ebony Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
• Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
• Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Ekundu Cyclops
oracle_text: If a creature you control attacks, Ekundu Cyclops also attacks if able.
flavor_text:
"Big one I, One big eye. One-eye see Two-eye die!"
—Traditional cyclops chant

name: Ekundu Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text:
"My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it."
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Enfeeblement
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text:
"If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it."
—Kaervek

name: Femeref Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text:
"Faith is my shield, and hope is my armor; I am vulnerable only to myself."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Femeref Knight
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{W}: Femeref Knight gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I will return / with lizard skins for your sandals. Paint your eyes black and wait for me."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Femeref Scouts
flavor_text:
"The days before the war were filled with strange portents: scouts and herders spoke of villages reduced to ash, of farmers taken from their fields, and of foul beasts roaming the plains in packs. I know, for I spoke to them all."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The night stalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref."
—Kaervek

name: Fetid Horror
oracle_text: {B}: Fetid Horror gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Of the six who went down the Uuserk Trail to scout ahead, one returned. She clawed at her eyes and nostrils and sobbed with horror. I was curious about what she saw, but we chose another path."
—Scout Ekemet, final journal

name: Firebreathing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest."
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Flare
oracle_text:
Flare deals 1 damage to any target.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"In the forest, fires light the sky as black clouds unfold their weight."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"More armies have been lost in the confusion of the jungle mists than to any battle."
—Jolrael

name: Giant Mantis
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"I hate insects of every sort. The only mercy is that they are generally small."
—Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

name: Gibbering Hyenas
oracle_text: Gibbering Hyenas can't block black creatures.
flavor_text:
Hyenas laughing—what's the joke?
—Femeref phrase meaning "that's not funny"

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They talk a good fight.

name: Goblin Tinkerer
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its mana value to Goblin Tinkerer.
flavor_text:
"Can they *do* that?"
—Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

name: Granger Guildmage
oracle_text:
{R}, {T}: Granger Guildmage deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
{W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Leave no mouth agape, no stomach unfilled.
—Granger Guild maxim

name: Gravebane Zombie
oracle_text: If Gravebane Zombie would die, put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor_text:
"A zombie's bed must be a lumpy one or he wouldn't leave it so often."
—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

name: Grave Servitude
oracle_text:
You may cast Grave Servitude as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-1 and is black.
flavor_text:
"I no longer believe in a final resting place."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text:
"The Femeref look only to the Sun for healing; they have never truly understood life's cycle."
—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Incinerate
oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text:
"Never taunt an embermage, 'What are you going to do about it?'"
—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Ivory Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
• Tap target creature.
• Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Jolrael's Centaur
oracle_text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"What need have I for cavalry when I can have horse and rider both in one?"
—Jolrael

name: Jolt
oracle_text:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"There's nothing like a sudden shock to clarify one's thoughts."
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Jungle Wurm
oracle_text: Whenever Jungle Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
flavor_text: Broad as a baobab—and about as smart.

name: Kaervek's Torch
oracle_text:
As long as Kaervek's Torch is on the stack, spells that target it cost {2} more to cast.
Kaervek's Torch deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text:
The pulsing heat of the midday Sun burns in the Lion's eye.
—Stone inscription, source unknown

name: Kukemssa Serpent
oracle_text:
Kukemssa Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{U}, Sacrifice an Island: Target land an opponent controls becomes an Island until end of turn.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Kukemssa Serpent.

name: Lightning Reflexes
oracle_text:
You may cast Lightning Reflexes as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text: "Inhale. Kill. Exhale."

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The caliph was so intelligent he could not remember what he knew."
—Azeworai, "Three Riddles"

name: Merfolk Raiders
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"Turn your back for a second and they just vanish! As if they weren't shifty enough before."
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

name: Merfolk Seer
oracle_text: When Merfolk Seer dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
The sea leaves no room for tears.
—Zhalfirin adage

name: Mtenda Herder
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"All animals—even humans—can be herded. The trick is to make them think they choose their own destination."
—Mangara

name: Mtenda Lion
oracle_text: Whenever Mtenda Lion attacks, defending player may pay {U}. If that player does, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by Mtenda Lion this turn.
flavor_text:
"The lion drank that lake right up! In thanks, he gave Siti the power to speak with lions and make them leave the goats alone."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Noble Elephant
oracle_text: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"Proud am I, / strong am I, / courageous in defending my children / and fierce in punishing what stands in my way."
—"So the Elephant Speaks," Zhalfirin song

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Power Sink
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

name: Prismatic Circle
oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
As Prismatic Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{1}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Pyric Salamander
oracle_text: {R}: Pyric Salamander gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice Pyric Salamander at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
When you've been chased by a dragon, you run from every lizard.
—Suq'Ata saying

name: Quirion Elves
oracle_text:
As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Raging Spirit
oracle_text: {2}: Raging Spirit becomes colorless until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Its burning power is more elusive than shade on the Unyaro Plains, more perilous than the horn of a rhino."
—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"I've never *heard* growth before."
—Gowon, Femeref herder

name: Ray of Command
oracle_text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
flavor_text: "Heel."

name: Reality Ripple
oracle_text: Target artifact, creature, or land phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor_text:
"Can you prepare for the unexpected? No, you cannot. You can prepare only to be surprised."
—Teferi

name: Regeneration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"Death is not a debt I am yet willing to pay."
—Purraj of Urborg

name: Restless Dead
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Restless Dead.
flavor_text:
The rich's heirs often thank them after death . . . but preferably not in person.
—Suq'Ata epigram

name: Ritual of Steel
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Ritual of Steel enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
flavor_text:
"Our soldiers are blessed with lizard scales as hard and cold as steel."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Sabertooth Cobra
oracle_text: Whenever Sabertooth Cobra deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. The player gets another poison counter at the beginning of their next upkeep unless they pay {2} before that step. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Sandbar Crocodile
oracle_text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"We've run aground sandbars before, but today, a sandbar ran aground us."
—Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

name: Sandstorm
oracle_text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text:
Better to fight the sand for a few hours than to sleep beneath it forever.
—Suq'Ata truism

name: Sapphire Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
• Target creature an opponent controls phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

name: Searing Spear Askari
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{R}: Searing Spear Askari gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: When the other soldiers of Zhalfir fall, the askaris will yet stand.

name: Seedling Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target Aura attached to a creature to its owner's hand.
• Regenerate target green creature.
• Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

name: Serene Heart
oracle_text: Destroy all Auras.
flavor_text:
"If magic is your crutch, cast it aside and learn to walk without it."
—Teferi

name: Sewer Rats
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than three times each turn.
flavor_text:
You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.
—Suq'Ata insult

name: Shadow Guildmage
oracle_text:
{U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.
{R}, {T}: Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
flavor_text:
To keep the dead so others may live.
—Shadow Guild maxim

name: Shaper Guildmage
oracle_text:
{W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Shape this world in Zhalfir's image.
—Shaper Guild maxim

name: Skulking Ghost
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text:
"They exist only so long as the living take no notice."
—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Soar
oracle_text:
You may cast Soar as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Would you give up your hands to fly? That is what the birds have done."
—*The One Thousand Questions*

name: Soulshriek
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"The flesh is a casket for the soul."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"There are times solid ground gives precious little comfort."
—Talibah, embermage

name: Stalking Tiger
oracle_text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"What rainbow could possibly come of this rain?"
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Talruum Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text:
Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift.
—Suq'Ata saying

name: Teferi's Curse
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of their untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"Stepping through time is like riding a camel. It may get you where you want to go, but the ride is rarely pleasant."
—Teferi

name: Teferi's Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"We threw dried fruit to the drakes that rode the air, streaming along the *Weatherlight'*s side as we sailed amidst the clouds."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Teremko Griffin
oracle_text: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"When we're aloft, I love to lean over the *Weatherlight*'s railing and watch the patterns the griffins' shadows make on the clouds below."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Thirst enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Thirst unless you pay {U}.
flavor_text: The first of the Thousand Deaths.

name: Tranquil Domain
oracle_text: Destroy all non-Aura enchantments.
flavor_text:
"An ancient court mage unified the houses into guilds to serve Zhalfir above their own interests. Even during the civil war, the guilds stood together, a testament to the wisdom of Teferi."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Uktabi Faerie
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{G}, Sacrifice Uktabi Faerie: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
Victim of the two-toed faerie
—Suq'Ata expression meaning "broken"

name: Urborg Panther
oracle_text:
{B}, Sacrifice Urborg Panther: Destroy target creature blocking Urborg Panther.
Sacrifice a creature named Feral Shadow, a creature named Breathstealer, and Urborg Panther: Search your library for a card named Spirit of the Night, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Viashino Warrior
flavor_text:
"When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."
—*Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert*

name: Village Elder
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text:
"Enchant me with your tale-telling. Tell about Tree, Grass, River, and Wind. / Tell why Truth must fight with Falsehood, and why Truth will always win."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Wall of Corpses
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}, Sacrifice Wall of Corpses: Destroy target creature Wall of Corpses is blocking.
flavor_text:
"I shall make walls of their flesh, and their blood will be my mortar."

name: Wall of Resistance
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
